name: MyPatronus
0:
”Alexa, My Patronus”
”Alexa, open My Patronus”
”Alexa, launch My Patronus”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my patronus
des:
Unlock the mystery and discover your animal Patronus!

HOW TO PLAY:

Step 1: Say the incantation “Expecto Patronum”
Step 2: Answer 6 Harry Potter themed personality questions.
Step 3: Think of your happiest memory, and (with confidence) say “Expecto Patronum,” loud and clear. 

Based on the evaluation, Alexa will determine your Patronus and give you a brief personality description. There are many possibilities, including a few rare creatures, such as a Hippogriff, Unicorn, and Phoenix! 

Which Patronus did you get?

For questions, suggestions, or comments, please email Seaside.VoiceApps@gmail.com

Note: This is a fan-made, unofficial Harry Potter Alexa skill. Not affiliated with J.K. Rowling, Bloomsbury Publishing, or Warner Bros.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
